text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the MSI GT Series GT83 TITAN-016 18.4" IPS GTX 1070 SLI 16 GB VRAM i7-8850H 32 GB Memory 512 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GT Series GT83 TITAN-016 18.4" IPS GTX 1070 SLI 16 GB VRAM i7-8850H 32 GB Memory 512 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG!

The MSI GT Series GT83 TITAN-016 18.4" IPS GTX 1070 SLI 16 GB VRAM i7-8850H 32 GB Memory 512 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
